content:
Name

Crit Effect

Type
Attack the Darkness Your enemies are concealed from you until the end of your next turn.

Melee
Aim Carefully Next Time Until the end of your next turn, your attacks require and extra action to use.

Ranged
Brutal Collision Attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If you succeed, you're stunned 1. If you fail, you're stunned 2.

Unarmed
Power Transfer The highest-level spell effect currently affecting you is transferred to your target.

Spell
name: Critical Fumble Deck #9
